website_summaries.verdict: A luggage scale that provides accurate readings, a stable display, a capacity overload indicator, and other great features.
pros: Hanging scale requires only two AAA batteries to operate
Includes a tare function that enables you to read the net weight of your luggage easily and precisely
Utilized textured hand grip ensures you can carry the scale comfortably
cons: Instructions sometimes can be tough to understand
May be challenging to switch scale readings from kilograms to pounds or vice-versa

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this was skeptical whether it will perfectly capture weight as the mode of holding the weight is constantly moving . But surprisingly it gives weight almost with close accuracy . Though it is perfect tool for weighing up to 50 lbs, beyond that I guess it is difficult to hold it in hand as the length of the instrument is shorter and would not give enough room (length) to hold it steadily . If the product is more lengthier then it would have addressed that issue . I guess it’s trade off for its compactness. This is not for some one who needs 100 percent accuracy ( decimal level accuracy )
customer_reviews.author: SimpleShop

customer_reviews.title: Need to be a weightlifter to use
customer_reviews.text: Unless you can lift your suitcase off the floor and hold it steady until the scale settles on a number, don't buy this one. I wasn't strong enough and had to hold the suitcase away from my body which is a totally unsafe way of lifting heavy objects. Today I have neck and back pain. Also to change from kg to pounds you must depress the button rapidly or it cycles back to kg. Other than that it seemed to be accurate. If you're strong this may work for you, but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hula Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight scale with good ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a lightweight luggage scale that wasn't as bulky/heavy as our older Balanzza unit and this one looked promising. The backlit LCD display is a nice improvement and the ergonomics are pretty decent too. The strap and buckle design is good, quicker to do/undo. Unit is light and compact as we hoped. Description did not mention a "hold" feature, quite pleased that it does do that. Was a little annoyed that one of the endcaps came right off, will have to glue that on. For the price, its a nice scale.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Guest use and shattered in hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could use for travel. The first time I used it, it shattered in my hands cutting a deep cut on palm and a bunch of tiny cuts on top of hand. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: works fine for now, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and seems to work fine for now. Have used it a few times and the battery hasn't died yet. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Krahn

customer_reviews.title: Super Accurate! I did not pay excess baggage fees! Woo Hoo!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! We had to fly back my daughter from college with 6 large pieces of luggage loaded with her dorm stuff. With prior experience with another "name brand" scale that had failed, I'm glad i bought this scale! Weighed everything at the hotel right at 50 lb's so I would not have to pay excess baggage fees! Get to the ticket counter and all bags checked out under 50 lbs just as I had weighed them!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Chancey Jr

customer_reviews.title: Must have for weighing your suitcases for air travel!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is perfect for weighing my bigger suitcases that don’t fit on my bathroom scale. It will be great to bring with me for air travel. It has dual settings for kg/lbs. It also has a temperature reading in Fahrenheit and Celsius.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy t use once you figure how to switch from Kg to pounds. It doesn't like to settle on a weight but bounces back and forth within a range, making it a bit hard to read. We find it weighs too low by 2-3 pounds so don't go over 47 lbs if you expect to come in under 50 lbs at the check-in.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Traveler's must have
customer_reviews.text: It works very well except the hook is not the same as depicted on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Guions

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Strap is long enough to go around handles. It was off by maybe a 1 lb. well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Rene B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accurate luggage scale, but can't switch from lbs from kg. Not a big deal, but still....
customer_reviews.author: Andy Z

customer_reviews.title: Item works good though. packaging is good too as well
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to change from kg to lb etc. It does have an instruction, but theres only one button on the device. It is press and hold and press and hold for 3 seconds for switching and turning on/off. It is a bit confusing to be honest. Item works good though. packaging is good too as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yukki Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good looking scale.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it for its intended purpose as yet. However , I like its compactness and display. I have not been able to use one of these scales that give the same results as the one at the reservation desk. Who knows, for reasons known only to the airlines, this may be an impossibility. When I use it later I will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good electronic scale with caveats
customer_reviews.text: Good electronic scale. It can be difficult to hold luggage stationery long enough to get weight to lock in. It helps if someone else can steady the bag or use it near a wall. I took away 1 start because it was 5-7 lbs off of airport scales (tested against multiple from different airlines). That is important to note because if bag is 44lbs at home you could easily be over 50lbs limit at airport which is super annoying. Shoot for 40-42lbs at home to be safe at airport.
customer_reviews.author: keenism

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use you
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this scale for traveling. It's small & simple. Easy to use you . Nice travelers scale.
customer_reviews.author: sazzad chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Crummy Product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't say it was used or returned. Was supposed to include battery, but didn't. On and off is pushed in and doesn't operate properly. The only good thing was it came a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: returning this. it's useless. You have to stand so incredibly balanced to even get a close reading, and it is very manipulated by movement. better to just ask the bell hop what he thinks about weight of your luggage. that's more accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for air travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this scale for traveling. Works perfectly and easy to use. It's small & simple
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Used the scale on a hand weight to gauge th accuracy. It was high by .22 lbs, but better high than low so I don't go over as the airport scale is likely to be a little high too. I'm very happy with this little scale, and will likely buy another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Thank you "Wranglerstar!" (youtube)
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly... saw a "youtuber" (Wranglerstar) using this to help him reconfigure his hiking backpack and was impressed with his demonstration as so I bought one myself for the same reason and many others.
customer_reviews.author: kbron97

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It is small and light and doesn't take much space so you can take it you on your nest trip. I appears to be more accurate than weighing yourself and weighing you and your bag and subtracting the differance.
customer_reviews.author: RA Campos

customer_reviews.title: This scale is nice and compact with an easy to read back lit ...
customer_reviews.text: This scale is nice and compact with an easy to read back lit screen. Easy to change the unit of measure and so small that we keep it in our suitcase all the time to make sure we are not over weight for checked bags for the plane. Came quickly and with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bee410

customer_reviews.title: Easy and SPOT on!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - was spot on with the scale at the airport - A must have for any traveler trying to maximize their suitcase travel weights. Easy to set up and use. packs easily in my carry on. (Dont forget to take along for your return flight!)
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: the product arrived on time and was perfect for short use
customer_reviews.text: The buttons on it were poorly made and messed up soon after my purchase and the screen had a few display issues. However, the product arrived on time and was perfect for short use. I wouldn't buy it again, but I do recommend it for those that need a cheep scale for a short vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This scale is wonderful. I gave one to my son away at school and we never travel without one and it measures pretty accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Saluces

customer_reviews.title: Good scale
customer_reviews.text: Overall good scale. Gave 4 starts bc of the power button...it’s not a sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: PSC

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality portable scale that fits the purpose perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality portable scale that fits the purpose perfectly. It would make a perfect gift for a frequent traveler! I definitely recommend buying it!!
customer_reviews.author: Simsima

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried to use it and it broke :(
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Weigh in on this!
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale... excellent for what it is designed for... Had just a slight problem with getting it set to the correct settings, but all in all it worked great.. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: FrankB

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and easy to use and can store easily in any of your luggage pockets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Small, light weight, and easy to use. Great price and works as advertised. Has all the auto features you want from a digital device. It will always be with me when traveling with my wife. Her bags always seem to be over weight when traveling on leisure trips. A must have travel item!
customer_reviews.author: Chip A.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate portable digital scale
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple times. Each time was accurate and if not spot on only off by less then a pound! Great for trips. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Desmand’s Legacy

customer_reviews.title: It's great, easy to use and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: We are using this as a postal scale for shipping items sold on eBay. It's great, easy to use and easy to store. We have weighed luggage up to 55 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: but I think they will get wonderful use from the luggage scale
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, so I'm not sure, but I think they will get wonderful use from the luggage scale. It came in plenty of time for 12/25!
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Rain lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm having trouble getting it to switch from kg. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm having trouble getting it to switch from kg. to lbs. I've tried to get it to change by pressing the power button until is my preferred unit of weight is displayed but 3 frustrating days later still, it won't switch from kgs. to lbs. I can do the conversion using an on-line conversion chart but I'm disappointed in the product not functioning as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective and only displays weight in kilos in spite of following all the instructions. Unfortunately I ordered it right before I went on a long trip to Europe and had to use it, calculating conversions every time I weighed my suitcase. By the time I was done traveling it was too late to return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Scale readings incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Scale was not accurate at all. Readings were off by 2-4 lbs almost every 2 out of 3 times. We ran into trouble while flying as the scale at the airport measured 3-4 lbs more than what the scale showed.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: weight for ideas
customer_reviews.text: I could not weight my suitcase because I could not lift it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good product to serve the purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's good product meant for its purpose. Only concern is in difficulty in lifting and hence 4 star otherwise good product. I recently received this product and so far so good. Will get to know more on long term use about its sturdiness and durability. I would recommend this product for frequent flyer traveling with baggage and not to get charged extra for over weight luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like this will be very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good product. Small, inexpensive with a good sized display.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just took it on vacation. Worked well. Handy to have kg option
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and very convenient. I hope so it will work long time and properly. I am new user of this and I used it a couple of time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Avetisyan

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It works well! It feels like it is going to break when I hold it (lightweight), but it it's just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Perfect for airline travel baggage weight. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Danni1226

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! It is small and easy to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! It is small and easy to store or carry in a pocket. Our son, who travels the world, introduced us to this handy invention. A question: what is the purpose of the small red item included? We could find no reference to its use in the packaging. Please reply! It may be important!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: Good compact scale for travel
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, actually better than expected for the size.

customer_reviews.title: I used this product on my recent vacation and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my recent vacation and it is very accurate. It saves you the trouble of guessing and shifting contents to other luggage pieces trying to get under the airline weight restrictions.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A MUST for travelers (like me) who tend to "overpack"!! Works great!

customer_reviews.title: gREAT SCALE
customer_reviews.text: iT IS A GREAT SCALE JUST WHAT i NEEDED FOR MY TRIP.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, beautiful design and the choice of scale unit. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy to use, I carry it with me everywhere to make sure i don't overload my checked bag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: This device does the trick. It's small and lightweight, so it's very easy to pack.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Received today... Returning tomorrow. Would only work in kg mode. Display was only visible looking directly at it.
customer_reviews.author: jlsherfick

customer_reviews.title: Handy Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Handy little gadget for weighing your luggage instead of trying to weigh with a regular scale. Easy to use. Glad we purchased it.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Good transaction.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and is more accurate than my old scale. Fast shipping, too!

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions. Difficult to change to pounds. Takes button batteries instead of readily available AA or AAA.

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: The product is really a high quality one. I like it very much.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Very useful to weigh luggage when i travel to India.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and amazing communication! The scale itself is honestly better than I was expecting, because this thing is great. A++ and thank you very very much!

customer_reviews.title: ... out but I saw a video on it and liked the product
customer_reviews.text: They were gifts to colleagues so I personally did not try them out but I saw a video on it and liked the product. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very good and accurate. I compared with other type of scale and it gives same reading for same load.

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and appears to be exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Upgraded Luggage Scale, Wirezoll Digital Hanging Scale with LED Display for Travel, 110 Pounds / 50 Kg, Black
product_meta.description:
This sleek digital Luggage Scale is small and handy with room temperature display when press on the unit button. It is easy to store, carry and convenient for traveler.




Key Features




Large and clear LED display makes read easy, even in dim light

Easy to display in either lb or kg, you can switch the units of measurement by long pressing on/off button

Zero/tare function instantly resets scale back to zero

long press for 3 seconds to power off or let it auto power-off after 60 seconds

overload and low power indication

Stainless steel hook together with sturdy woven band makes good looking and durability

This Pocket sized scale increased the portability & convenience for your trip and life




Product Specifications




Capacity: 110 lb/ 50 kg, Zero and tare function

High Precision Weight Sensors: Accurate to 0.1 lb / 50g

Units change: kg/lb

Battery: 2 x AAA battery

LED display: 1.44\" LCD Display, with comfortable rubber paint handle

Auto power-off: 60s

Low power indication: Lo

Overload/Error indication: O-Ld




Packing List

1 x Wirezoll Digital Luggage Scale

2 x AAA battery

1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: 【Capacity】High-accuracy readings for hefty weights: Capacity: 110lb/50kg, precision accuracy: 0.1lb/0.05kg
【LED Display】A clear LCD backlit screen for day and night visibility to accurately display both weight
【Power】Hanging scale powered by 2 aaa batteries for power supply(include) with Low battery / overload indication

【Multi-Functions】Once the luggage is stable display, the scale will locks onto weight for easy reading. Capacity Overload indicator shows when bags are over the scale limit. Low battery indicator gives you plenty of notice to ensure your scale is ready when you need it. Also Tare function allows you to read the net weight of your luggage easily and precisely
【Traveler Design】Durable and heavy duty to stand the test of time and travel. Portable and easy to store at home or in your suitcase. Rubber Paint Technology; Utilized textured hand-grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
